headline.main: China to Continue to Cut Overcapacity in Steel Sector in 2018
headline.print_headline: China to Continue to Cut Overcapacity in Steel Sector in 2018

lead_paragraph: China will continue to cut excess capacity in the steel sector in 2018, National Development and Reform Commission (NDRC) Vice Chairman Ning Jizhe said at a news conference on Monday.
snippet: China will continue to cut excess capacity in the steel sector in 2018, National Development and Reform Commission (NDRC) Vice Chairman Ning Jizhe said at a news conference on Monday....
